value.title: Artificial Intelligence: NI can be 'testing centre' for new technology

value.title: Scientists are using AI to track coal train dust
value.excerpt: Across the United States, around 70 percent of coal travels by rail, transiting from dozens of mines to power plants and shipping terminals.
